OrgName.entry: NORFOLK PARK TENANTS AND RESIDENTS ASSOCIATION (NPTARA)

AltName.entry: NORFOLK PARK SHEFFIELD CORPORATION TENANTS ASSOCIATION

Desc.entry: Works closely with the Police, housing associations, Sheffield Homes, private home owners and deals with all estate issues. Also works with local councilors, South Sheffield Regeneration and Norfolk Park Primary School on matters that arise. Fundraises for local charities. Holds Christmas Cracker at the end of November in the centre of Norfolk Heritage Park, an Easter event and a Christmas party for older residents at Guildford Grange.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Thurs 7.30-10pm (Bingo), Last Wed in the month (committee meeting)

category.entry: TENANTS AND RESIDENTS GROUPS - POSTAL DISTRICT 2
